attributes.action: Reduce the price of Covid PCR Test for travels to £50
attributes.additional_details: I want it because I think it’s not fair that a test could cost £140 or more per person. I’m not travelling for leisure but only to see my family after a year and to show them their grandchildren.
attributes.background: The Covid PCR Test for travel is now to expensive, the average is £140, and for a family like mine is not sustainable. I’ve had my first child in November and I couldn’t show him to my parents yet, so we are planning to go in Italy in July, but the PCR Test is to expensive for us.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Lower the price of the £210 COVID Home Test Kits for travellers entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575509
